turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, I would like to order two small pizzas from Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have a chicken barbecue with jalape単os, please?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have a veggie lover's pizza on thick crust with extra jalape単os, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 2 small thick crust pizzas, one chicken bbq and extra jalapenos and the other a veggie lovers with extra jalapenos, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $26, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, it's great. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be picking up, dining in or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll pick them up. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. You have a beautiful night.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thanks, you as well. enjoy your pizzas.
